item.title: 关税在即，安大略省就矿业交易向特朗普抛出橄榄枝
item.description: 在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对加拿大北部国家征收瘫痪性关税之际，加拿大人口最多省份的领导人提出要在关键矿产方面与美国结成 "新的战略联盟"。【原文：The leader of Canada’s most populous province is pitching a “renewed strategic alliance” with the US on critical minerals, as President-elect Donald Trump threatens crippling tariffs on the northern nation.】

item.title: 美国银行认为期限风险抑制了对公司债券的需求
item.description: 美国银行的策略师预计，今年降息次数减少的前景将削弱对期限较长的投资级债券的需求。【原文：Bank of America strategists expect the prospect of fewer interest-rate cuts this year to weaken the demand for longer-duration, investment-grade bonds.】

item.title: 特朗普上台，华尔街认为美元将进一步反弹
item.description: 华尔街预测美元将进一步走高，因为美国经济复苏，降息预期减弱，而美国新任总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发誓要征收严厉的关税。【原文：Wall Street is forecasting even more gains in the dollar as a resilient US economy and dwindling expectations for interest-rate cuts coincide with incoming President Donald Trump’s vows for harsh tariffs.】

item.title: 洛杉矶公用事业公司债券销售在火灾中陷入困境
item.description: 在南加州野火肆虐的情况下，洛杉矶水电局原本预计本周发行的债券在周一转入 "日常状态"。【原文：A bond offering by the Los Angeles Department of Water and Power that was expected to price this week moved to “day to day status” on Monday amid the wildfires in Southern California, according to people familiar with the matter, who asked not to be identified discussing the deal.】

item.title: 预算僵局令法国企业陷入不确定迷雾
item.description: 法国银行表示，法国企业继续面临该国长期预算危机带来的更大不确定性，导致经济前景低迷。【原文：French businesses continue to face heightened uncertainty from the country’s prolonged budget crisis, contributing to a sluggish economic outlook, the Bank of France said.】

item.title: 交易员为 S&P 有史以来最大的财报日反应做好准备
item.description: 交易员们正准备迎接股市历史上最不稳定的盈利期之一。【原文：Traders are bracing for one of the most volatile earnings periods in stock market history.】

item.title: 沙利文敦促特朗普团队关注中国网络威胁
item.description: 美国国家安全顾问杰克-沙利文（Jake Sullivan）表示，如果中国发动网络攻击，对美国造成实际破坏，中国将面临严重后果，而阻止这种行为应该是即将上任的特朗普政府的首要任务。【原文：National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan said China would face severe consequences if it launches a cyberattack that causes physical destruction in the US, and deterring such a move should be a priority for the incoming Trump administration.】

item.title: 收益率飙升，美国 IPO 市场反弹面临现实考验
item.description: 交易商们正在为繁忙的首次公开募股年做准备，但他们已经遇到了一个严峻的挑战：国债收益率上升可能会降低新股上市的热情。【原文：Dealmakers, who were gearing up for a busy year of initial public offerings, have already been confronted by a formidable challenge: rising Treasury yields that could deflate enthusiasm for new listings.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚财政部长称左翼领导人不能吓跑投资者
item.description: 哥伦比亚新任财政部长迭戈-格瓦拉（Diego Guevara）表示，哥伦比亚政府致力于将公共债务保持在可持续的轨道上，并保持投资者的信心。【原文：Colombia’s government is committed to keeping public debt on a sustainable path and retaining investor confidence, the nation’s new Finance Minister Diego Guevara said.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑扩大对马斯克 X 的调查，数字技术负责人称
item.description: 欧盟最高数字官员表示，欧盟正在考虑扩大对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交网络是否违反其内容审核规则的调查。【原文：The European Union is considering expanding its investigation into whether Elon Musk’s X social network breached its content moderation rulebook, the bloc’s top digital official said.】

item.title: 拜登制裁威胁市场混乱，油轮运价飙升
item.description: 由于拜登政府对俄罗斯石油贸易的制裁有可能削减船舶供应，同时迫使贸易商寻求其他原油来源，油轮运费周一跳涨。【原文：Oil tanker rates jumped on Monday as the Biden Administration’s sanctions on Russia’s petroleum trade threaten to cut the supply of ships while forcing traders to seek alternative sources of crude.】

item.title: 德国肉类出口受到口蹄疫疫情威胁
item.description: 在德国近四十年来首次出现口蹄疫病例之后，德国的肉类出口正面临威胁，这对该国的生产商来说又是一次潜在的打击。【原文：German meat exports are under threat following the first case of foot-and-mouth disease there in almost four decades, in another potential blow to the country’s producers.】

item.title: 账单飙升，波士顿市长再次推动房主减税
item.description: 波士顿市长米歇尔-吴（Michelle Wu）正试图重启一项失败的努力，以减轻房产税增幅达到两位数的房主的负担。【原文：Boston Mayor Michelle Wu is attempting to revive a failed effort to ease the burden on homeowners hit with double-digit increases in their property taxes.】

item.title: 康卡斯特将收购 76 人队少数股份，加入新球场合资企业
item.description: 康卡斯特公司和 Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment 同意成立一家 50-50 合资企业，在南费城体育中心建造 NBA 费城 76 人队和曲棍球飞人队的新场馆。【原文：Comcast Corp. and Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment agreed to a 50-50 joint venture to build the NBA’s Philadelphia 76ers and hockey’s Flyers a new arena in the South Philadelphia Sports Complex.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省省长警告：特朗普的关税即将到来，并将包括石油在内
item.description: 艾伯塔省省长丹妮尔-史密斯（Danielle Smith）在佛罗里达州会见当选总统后警告说，一旦唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）下周就任总统，加拿大人应做好面对美国关税的准备，石油将不会得到豁免。【原文：Canadians should be prepared to face US tariffs once Donald Trump assumes the presidency next week, with no exemptions for oil, Alberta Premier Danielle Smith warned after meeting the president-elect in Florida.】

item.title: 稳定币发行商 Tether 将在萨尔瓦多设立总部，并迁移部门
item.description: 稳定币发行商 Tether Holdings Ltd. 在中美洲国家萨尔瓦多获得数字资产服务提供商许可证后，将把公司实体和子公司迁往该国。【原文：Stablecoin issuer Tether Holdings Ltd. will move its corporate entity and subsidiaries to El Salvador after securing a digital asset service provider license in the Central American nation.】

item.title: 贝宁出售 7.5 亿美元债券的计划面临窗口期缩小的问题

item.title: 新山即将达成收购 Access Healthcare 的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新山资本（New Mountain Capital）即将收购 Access Healthcare，该交易可能会使这家收入周期管理集团的估值达到约 20 亿美元。【原文：New Mountain Capital is nearing an acquisition of Access Healthcare in a deal that could value the revenue cycle management group at about $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查显示，美国消费者认为未来通胀将更加强劲
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行（Federal Reserve Bank of New York）的月度调查显示，美国消费者表示，他们认为未来几年的通胀率将高于此前的预期，这是11月大选后人们对物价日益担忧的最新迹象。【原文：US consumers said they see higher inflation over the next few years than previously thought, a monthly Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey showed, in the latest sign of mounting concerns about prices following November’s elections.】

item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普政府的上台，都柏林与美国的关系可能会受到削弱，而爱尔兰正在寻找欧盟更东边的盟友，以便在欧盟中获得更多的影响力。【原文：Ireland is looking for allies further east in the European Union to gain more leverage in the bloc at a time when Dublin’s ties with the US are likely to weaken with the incoming Donald Trump administration.】

item.title: 避开中国，资产管理公司寻求加倍巴西风险敞口

item.title: 财政部长皮克表示，加纳必须进一步削减开支
item.description: 卡西尔-阿托-福森（Cassiel Ato Forson）即将成为加纳下一任财政部长，他说，这个西非国家必须采取更多措施削减开支，以稳定正在努力从债务危机中复苏的经济。【原文：Cassiel Ato Forson, who’s poised to become Ghana’s next finance minister, said the West African nation must do more to cut spending to stabilize an economy that’s struggling to recover from a debt crisis.】
